Pensacola.WCOA (AM):
WCOA (1370 AM, "News/Talk 1370") is an American radio station serving the Pensacola, Florida, area with a News/Talk format. This station is under ownership of Cumulus Media.


== History ==
On February 3, 1926, hundreds of people gathered in Plaza Ferdinand in downtown Pensacola to hear the first sounds of radio in Northwest Florida.
